VoiceList.Entry: Red XIII “Don't worry about me. I've seen it many times.”
“I haven't been back for a while… Let me rest for a bit.”
“It's not that I'm afraid of that big star.”
“It's just that,uh,I have a stomach ache… That's why I'm not moving. That's the truth!”
“Both Nanaki and Bugenhagen are gone… I feel so lonely…”
“That Nanaki's slick! He said, 'I'll protect this canyon'! But he didn't. Forget about Nanaki.”
Red XIII “Sorry…I'm really sorry. But now,I have…”
“He's finally come home,but Bugenhagen doesn't seem well…”
“I want to hear Bugenhagen talk with Nanaki like we used to do…”
“Nanaki,is it true that Bugenhagen left on a journey? Then that means he's better,right? He IS going to come back soon,right?”
“…Don't worry. Grandpa will come back floating, saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again…”
“It's Ho Ho Hoooo! Ho Ho Hoooo!”
